title: Greetings and Politeness in the Modern Office

sections.title: Greetings and Farewells
sections.content:
How to say hello and goodbye to colleagues and clients.

- **Hello / Hi**: Hola
- **Good morning**: Buenos días
- **Good afternoon**: Buenas tardes
- **Good evening**: Buenas noches (greeting)
- **Goodbye / Bye**: Adiós
- **See you later**: Hasta luego
- **Have a nice day**: Tenga un buen día

sections.title: Courtesy Expressions
sections.content:
Professional 'magic words'.

- **Please**: Por favor
- **Thank you / Thanks**: Gracias
- **You're welcome**: De nada
- **Excuse me**: Disculpe / Con permiso
- **I'm sorry**: Lo siento / Perdón

sections.title: Modern Tools: AI Assistant
sections.content:
In the modern office, we talk to **AI Assistants** too.

- **AI Assistant**: Asistente de IA (e.g., ChatGPT, Copilot)
- **Voice command**: Comando de voz
- **Helpful**: Servicial
- **Chat**: Chatear / Conversar

### Interaction Example
```mermaid
graph LR
    A[Banker] --> B{AI Assistant}
    B --> C[Email Help]
    B --> D[Data Info]
```

sections.title: Grammar: Verbo 'To Be' in Context
sections.content:
Using 'to be' for introductions.

- **Hello, I am** Mark. **Is the AI** helpful?
- **Yes, it is**. **Are you** new here?
- **No, I am not**. **It is** my second month.

objectives: Use appropriate greetings for the time of day
Show basic courtesy in office interactions
Understand the role of AI assistants in a modern office

keyTerms.definition: A computer program that helps you with tasks.
